com.google.crypto.tink.hybrid.internal

Class X25519Jce

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.crypto.tink.hybrid.internal.X25519Jce

  • public final class X25519Jce
extends Object
    X25519 implementation using JCE.

    We use the PKCS8 and X509 encodings of the private and the public keys, because they are supported by all JCE implementations and they are easier to convert from and to their raw 32-byte encodings.

    • Method Detail

      • isSupported

        public static boolean isSupported()
        Returns true if the JCE supports X25519.

        We do not support PKCS8 V2 defined in RFC 5958. If the provider uses that encoding, this function will return false.

      • generateKeyPair
